hero.title: Challenges that last.
hero.description: Take on exciting challenges with the cappic app and capture your experiences—alone, as a couple, or with friends. Choose your favorite categories, document special moments with photos, and break free from your daily routine!

metadata.description: cappic is the app for creative photo challenges with friends & family – create personal moments and capture them along the way.
